CREW_FOR_HIRE_DESC.message: Potential crew available for hire at this starport.

DOESNT_NEED_FREQUENT_CULTURE.message: doesn't need frequent cultural and social interactions

FOLLOWS_LAW_TO_THE_LETTER.message: follows the law to the letter

I_WILL_SEND_SOMEONE_AFTER_YOU.message: And I'll send some friends after you to collect my outstanding pay!

I_WOULD_NEVER_CONSIDER_WORKING_FOR_YOU.message: Are you joking? I would never consider working for you!

IM_SORRY_IM_NOT_PREPARED_TO_GO_ANY_LOWER.message: I'm sorry, I'm not prepared to go any lower.

IM_SORRY_YOUR_OFFER_ISNT_ATTRACTIVE_TO_M.message: I'm sorry, your offer isn't attractive to me.

LOVES_CULTURE.message: loves culture and diverse social interactions

MAKE_OFFER_OF_POSITION_ON_SHIP_FOR_STATE.message: Make offer of position on ship for stated amount

NO_CREW_AVAILABLE.message: Sorry, no candidates are currently seeking employment at {station}

NOT_PRO_OR_CONTRA_LAW.message: not particularly pro or contra law

OK_I_SUPPOSE_THATS_ALL_RIGHT.message: OK, I suppose that's all right.

POTENTIAL_CREW_MEMBERS.message: Potential crew members are registered as seeking employment at {station}:

SICK_OF_WORKING_FOR_YOU.message: I'm sick of working for you! I'm going to look for employment elsewhere and I'll make sure to spread the word about you around here. Good luck finding new crew!

THANKS_ILL_GET_SETTLED_ON_BOARD_IMMEDIAT.message: Thanks, I'll get settled on board immediately.

THAT_CERTAINLY_MAKES_THIS_OFFER_LOOK_BET.message: That certainly makes this offer look better!

THERE_DOESNT_SEEM_TO_BE_SPACE_FOR_ME_ON_.message: There doesn't seem to be space for me on board!

THOUGHT_DULL_FRONTIER.message: wasting my time in empty systems

WANTS_TO_GET_AWAY_FROM_CIVILIZATION.message: wants to get away from civilization

WILL_DO_WHAT_THEY_WANT.message: will do whatever they can get away with it
